product_name: Mammut T Aenergy GTX Hiking Boots - Women's - 2013 Overstock
long_description: The women's Mammut T Aenergy GTX Hiking Boots feature GORE-TEX waterproof technology that's guaranteed to keep your feet dry when you're stomping in puddles and jumping across streams while hiking. Nylon mesh uppers with synthetic overlays have GORE-TEX waterproof, breathable membranes to keep your feet dry and comfortable in wet weather. Mammut Rolling Concept(R) promotes a natural rolling of the foot while also providing good support and cushioning. Rubber toe caps add durability and protection. Patented Base Fit(R) lacing system lets you dial in the fit to keep your feet from slipping around inside the boots. Vibram(R) Scale rubber soles provide good traction on trails. Overstock.
short_description: The women's Mammut T Aenergy GTX Hiking Boots feature GORE-TEX waterproof technology that's guaranteed to keep your feet dry when you're stomping in puddles and jumping across streams while hiking.
